review: Love my Amazon Fire stick!  It makes watching amazon instant video readily available.
author: M. Vaughan "GFCF Mom"

review: Luv it but got quantity of two.  Think I'll keep for gift or another home tv.  Thx luv it
author: debbs "poldarksearcher"

review: the only way to make it better would be to add you tube or vevo type apps for music videos
author: Amazon Customer "pog1187"

review: Awesome. So easy to use, especially if you have amazon prime.  I prefer it to roku. Fire stick is Easier to set up!!!
author: nikkimc11

review: Dropped cable 11 years ago and have not looked back.  The Fire stick rocks!!!
author: 2007 POG Contest

review: Better than expected. It isn't a roku but it is great.
author: Nelson G.

review: It works very well with the apps available to it. It should have more access to the Amazon app store. You can side load apps but why should you have to?
author: B. Carmack "Rev. Bill"

review: The Fire TV Stick does exactly what I wanted it to. I can now watch movies and shows from my Amazon instant video and Prime instant video on my TV instead of on only my computer.
author: David Haley
